content.text: 0) In a small bowl, stir the food coloring into the evaporated milk.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "stir"@20:24 / AC
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a small bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "the food coloring"@25:42 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the evaporated milk"@48:67 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Paint onto cookies with a paintbrush before baking.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Paint"@3:8 / AC
		:gol ( "cookies"@14:21 / FOOD )
		:instrument ( tool-1-0 "a paintbrush"@27:39 / TOOL )
		:duration ( cond-1-0 "before baking"@40:53 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
